instructions:
This sheet is for Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game by West End Games(WEG) that uses the d6 pool system(**Sheet Version 2.15**).
* Can be used for 1E, 2E, 2E R&E and REUP games, Wild Die can be disabled if wanted 
* NPC sheet available 
* Customization options include: hiding some sections, show/hide GM rolls, and disable/enable rolls to ask for modifiers before rolling 
* For more info, check out the sheet's [wiki page](https://wiki.roll20.net/Star_Wars_WEG_D6_character_sheet) 

 Issues, Ideas & Questions can be sent to the [active editor](https://app.roll20.net/users/1223200)

useroptions.description: PC is the normal sheet, NPC is a compact version of the same, Ship shows stat blocks for ship only, and Container shows only the Weapon/Armor/Equipment sections(simulating a Container or Shop display).
When checked, the sheet hides the extra dice that makes hidden rolls to the GM.
If checked, rolls don't ask for roll modifiers and rolls right away when selected.
If Wild Die isn't used, the last die wont explode or highlight critical successes/failures.
